page.title: 14MEDIA IN DACRE.
page.content: The local weekly published newspaper Herald is brought to the village for distribution by a local girl,Dawn Mallinson.Daily newspapers are not delivered in Dacre.Some people buy a newspaper from Penrith or Pooley Bridge.A delivery service exists for Sunday newspapers.Newspapers include The Sun,The Star and The Daily Express.Some people in Dacre have magazines delivered by post others collect them from Penrith.Magazines people take in Dacre.Farmers Weekly,Car,Home and Country,Grand Prix and Womens Weekly.Four television channels are received in Dacre.Two have breaks for commercial advertising.People in Dacre have radios and listen to many programmes.
